ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards]
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought it was just me.  I was hunting Crags for silks yesterday and thought it was just my new level that was making them run.  What a pain in the rear.  As
ygData.messageBody:
I thought it was just me. I was hunting Crags for silks yesterday and
thought it was just my new level that was making them run. What a pain in
the rear. As if I wasn't frustrated enough playing Chains, now it's twice
as needed.

Kit

>I have had various kinds of giants run from me but can't recall if,
>before the patch, any Hill Giants ever did. I do know there was some
>sort of change, however, as Crag Spiders (ugh, more silks...) now run
>when at low health where they did not this weekend.
